DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to determine whether or not varenicline will help people with cardiovascular disease quit smoking and to confirm it is safe in these patients.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Varenicline in Smokers With Cardiovascular Disease Who Wish to Quit Smoking
DOC.criteria: Participants must have stable, documented cardiovascular disease (including at least one of the following diagnosed > 2 months prior to the Screening visit angina, myocardial infarction (MI), revascularization, transient ischemic attack (TIA), and peripheral vascular disease (PVD). Participants that smoke > 10 cigarettes / day. Participants with unstable cardiovascular disease Cardiovascular events in the past 2 months Moderate or severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)
